text:
"Ronald Reagan Speaks Out Against Socialized Medicine" is a 1961 LP featuring Ronald Reagan. It is a ten-minute recording.
In the recording, Reagan criticized Social Security for "supplanting" private savings" and warned that medicine would be "bad for Americans' freedom" and that "pretty soon your son won't decide when he's in school, where he will go or what he will do for a living. He will wait for the government to tell him."
